TopicTitle: KSP "Factions" Ustream Live Mon-Fri 8am-5pm PST !! ON AIR !!

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program "Factions" Off-Air

Ustream Live Mon-Fri 8am-5pm PST

The Factions will be setup. KSC builds and tests all vessels.Factions will then have available craft to "buy" using there own resources at there local base.

Current Status: Setup of Factions' Main Bases

Mods Used: B9 Aerospace, KAS, Carrier Boat Parts, Kethane, ExtraPlanetary Launchpads, MechJeb2, Lazor System, Vanguard Tech, Edtools, Procedural Fairings, KSPX, Docking Strut and Firespitter.

Link: http://ustre.am/11W2r

All ads provided and serviced by USTREAM
